skill.s1.name: Nuclear Fantasy
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#00fcfe][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#00fcfe][b]Nuke DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy.
When using this skill, for every 1 stack of [color=#d6e3b1][b][Activate][/b][/color] on all allies, increases skill damage by [color=#00fcfe][b]10%[/b][/color].
skill.s2.name: Life Refinement
skill.s2.description: Converts 1 ally's [color=#00fcfe][b]30%[/b][/color] current [color=#00fcfe][b]HP[/b][/color] into [color=#00fcfe][b]Shield[/b][/color] with [color=#00fcfe][b]80%[/b][/color] ratio, and additionally gives [color=#00fcfe][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] + [color=#00fcfe][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#00fcfe][b]Shield[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.s3.name: Heroic Conversion
skill.s3.description: When this effect is active, for each 1 stack of [color=#d6e3b1][b][Activate][/b][/color] on the target, increases their [color=#00fcfe][b]ATK[/b][/color] based on [color=#00fcfe][b]20%[/b][/color] own [color=#00fcfe][b]ATK[/b][/color], up to [color=#00fcfe][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Gives 1 ally maxed stacks of [color=#d6e3b1][b][Activate][/b][/color] for 2 turns.

If their [color=#00fcfe][b]HP[/b][/color] is below [color=#00fcfe][b]60%[/b][/color] then restores their [color=#00fcfe][b]HP[/b][/color] to [color=#00fcfe][b]60% HP[/b][/color], up to [color=#00fcfe][b]200% ATK[/b][/color].
Increases their [color=#00fcfe][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#00fcfe][b]15%[/b][/color] of own's [color=#00fcfe][b]ATK[/b][/color], up to [color=#00fcfe][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.p1.name: Protest
skill.p1.description: When the effect of [ref=s2][color=#6fe0eb][b][u][Life Refinement][/u][/b][/color][/ref] ends, restores [color=#00fcfe][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color] based on remaining [color=#00fcfe][b]Shield[/b][/color].
skill.p2.name: Accompany
skill.p2.description: When any ally have 2 stacks of [color=#d6e3b1][b][Activate][/b][/color], additionally increases their [color=#00fcfe][b]CRIT DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#00fcfe][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
awareness.a0.name: Organic Transformer
awareness.a0.description: When any ally's [color=#00fcfe][b]HP[/b][/color] is not higher than [color=#00fcfe][b]75%[/b][/color], give them 1 stack of [color=#d6e3b1][b][Activate][/b][/color]: Increase their [color=#00fcfe][b]ATK[/b][/color] based on [color=#00fcfe][b]6%[/b][/color] own [color=#00fcfe][b]ATK[/b][/color] (Up to [color=#00fcfe][b]120/180/240 ATK[/b][/color], change when reaching level 1, 50, 70) for 1 turn, up to 2 stacks.
awareness.a1.name: City Guardian
awareness.a2.name: Oh! Duel to the Death
awareness.a2.description: [ref=s1][color=#6fe0eb][b][u][Nuclear Fantasy][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00fcfe][b]Lv. +2[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00fcfe][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color]
[ref=s2][color=#6fe0eb][b][u][Life Refinement][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00fcfe][b]Lv. +2[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00fcfe][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color]
awareness.a3.name: Edge Savior
awareness.a3.description: Increase own [color=#00fcfe][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#00fcfe][b]25%[/b][/color] when using a Persona skill on allies.
awareness.a4.name: Growth and Bond
awareness.a4.description: [ref=s3][color=#6fe0eb][b][u][Heroic Conversion][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00fcfe][b]Lv. +2[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00fcfe][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color]
[ref=hl][color=#6fe0eb][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00fcfe][b]Lv. +2[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00fcfe][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color]
awareness.a5.name: Homeward Hero
awareness.a5.description: [ref=hl][color=#6fe0eb][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Effect Boost: Increases the target's [color=#00fcfe][b]CRIT DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#00fcfe][b]25%[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
awareness.a6.name: The World Never Ends
awareness.a6.description: When using a Persona skill on allies, if their [color=#00fcfe][b]HP[/b][/color] is not higher than [color=#00fcfe][b]60%[/b][/color], increase their [color=#00fcfe][b]CRIT DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#00fcfe][b]25%[/b][/color] for 1 turn.
